metadata.description: We're hittin' ya up with two Spidey stories from times when he wasn't Secretly Invading or Branding New Days! First, Spidey teams up with Falcon to handle an outbreak of futuristic weaponry showing up in Harlem, and then MARY JANE takes center stage as she teams up with She-Hulk, Hellcat, Marvel Girl and some other lovely ladies to take on The Enchantress!
metadata.name: King-Size Spider-Man Summer Special
